mdRecord.dcterms:description: Drawing of communist sickle and hammer symbol. Response to an illegible graffiti. Ironic comment about loving exams; response about loving a person. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
} I feel that way | DAMN, I JUST LOVE EXAMS! | I JUST LOVE LINDA ‚Üê Linda who?
